item.title: Red-hot Giants overpower Lions with second-half demolition

item.description: The AFL advises that Essendon's Zach Merrett has won the 2024 ANZAC Day Medal with 11 votes

item.title: Stream your team: Watch VFL, VFLW, SANFL and WAFL games LIVE and FREE
